channel.title: Armour Glitching
channel.description: Alright, So Every "black armour" item in the game is glitching, The platebody and legs are invisible through parts of it and the defender is completely invisible and everything else is almost impossible to see, also the dragon defender when picked up or spawned is invis and nulls your account any solutions ?

item.title: Armour Glitching
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The black models being invisible is because some idiot decided the “Fix” for black triangles is to make the black triangles invisible.
They did this by setting the color 0 (solid black) to transparent. So any model with that color (black dragonhide, black armour, etc…) will have parts or all of it invisible.

Fix it by going into Model.java of your client and search something like “// Nezzy” or "// 633 model"
it’ll take you to a line with some non-renamed variables of an array. Something like anIntArray1340[l4] == 65535…
Look for the one that has anIntArray1340[l4] == 0 and remove it.

Note: ALL black triangles will show on your items.

Read full topic
